subject: Law
title: Conflicts of Interest
description: A quick win: understand Conflicts of Interest.

hook.text: A lawyer represents both husband and wife in a divorce. When they start fighting, whose side is she on?

buildup.text: A conflict of interest exists when a lawyer's duty to one client clashes with duties to another or to themselves.

discovery.text: Rule 1.7 of the Model Rules bars representation if there's a significant risk of conflicting loyalty.

twist.text: Some conflicts can be waived with informed consent. But some‚Äîlike representing both sides in litigation‚Äînever can.

climax.text: Conflict violations can lead to disqualification, malpractice suits, and disciplinary action against the lawyer.

punchline.text: Loyalty is a lawyer's first duty. Divided loyalty is no loyalty at all.
